subject: Football
lead_paragraph: LeBeau is resigning after 11 seasons as the Pittsburgh Steelers’ defensive coordinator. The Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reported that LeBeau was asked to step down by Coach Mike Tomlin.
snippet: LeBeau is resigning after 11 seasons as the Pittsburgh Steelers’ defensive coordinator. The Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reported that LeBeau was asked to step down by Coach Mike Tomlin.
